pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assessing the Partial Association Between Ordinal Variables // An implementation of the unified framework for assessing partial association between ordinal variables after adjusting for a set of covariates (Dungang Liu, Shaobo Li, Yan Yu and Irini Moustaki (2020), accepted by the Journal of the American Statistical Association). This package provides a set of tools to quantify, visualize, and test partial associations between multiple ordinal variables. It can produce a number of $phi$ measures, partial regression plots, 3-D plots, and $p$-values for testing $H_0: phi=0$ or $H_0: phi = delta$.
